H0.text: Convex mirrors are shaped like the outside of a bowl.

H1.text: Slope is the type of mirror shaped like the outside of a bowl.

H2.text: Concave mirrors are shaped like the outside of a bowl.

H3.text: Vertex is a type of mirror that is shaped like the outside of a bowl.

A4.text: The surface may be either convex (bulging outward) or concave (recessed inward).
